name: UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning
desc: A set of methods for implementing the animations for a custom view controller transition.

items.name: func animateTransition(using: UIViewControllerContextTransitioning)
items.desc: Tells your animator object to perform the transition animations.

items.name: func animationEnded(Bool)
items.desc: Tells your animator object that the transition animations have finished.

items.name: func transitionDuration(using: UIViewControllerContextTransitioning?) -> TimeInterval
items.desc: Asks your animator object for the duration (in seconds) of the transition animation.

items.name: func interruptibleAnimator(using: UIViewControllerContextTransitioning) -> UIViewImplicitlyAnimating
items.desc: Returns the interruptible animator to use during the transition.
